answerText: the electron transport chain [or the ETC; accept "transfer" for "transport" and "system" for "chain", and thus the associated acronyms as well][10] High-energy electrons are shuttled to the ETC by NADH and this derivative of riboflavin, which is reduced during the conversion of succinate to fumarate during the citric acid cycle.
heading: ACF Regionals 2014 |2014 | MCTC | 6 | Science | Biology | College
subject: Science
question: Question:  [10] Name this final major step in aerobic respiration, in which the energy from negatively charged particles is used to generate a proton gradient across the inner mitochondrial membrane.
